name: Schoolboy Runaway
storyline:
"Ah, scoundrel! Hurry up and study your lessons!" the parents said and placed under house arrest. Try to outsmart your parents and find a way to hang out with your friends.

Immersed in the role of a schoolboy whom his parents have punished for a bad grade at school, and tries to run away from home without being noticed by his father and mother.
summary: Dad won't let you out, can you outsmart your parents and escape?
